Text: Does anybody know if this is PAL or NTSC please?

1080p.BluRay = NTSC 
720p = PAL 
Read the info please

@ Yakomo ....... and you are a "trusted uploader" .... ( ? )

===============================================

YOU have used a "1080p.BluRay" as the "INPUT" in this Convert.

===============================================

THIS IS PAL MATERIAL ( 25 Frames per second )
